resources.string: I am presently worrying over possible misfortunes.
I am presently worrying over possible misfortunes.

Mood Checker is an application for research purposes. The app will collect data for researchers that will be used and analyzed in the future. By using Mood Checker you agree to sharing your data with these researchers. You can disable some background activities at any time from the settings. The survey is to be taken 3 times a day, and you will receive a notification when it is time to take it. After completing the survey, you should take a picture of yourself.
Click on the icon to start the survey. You may move on to the next question by double tapping on your desired answer. The progress bar at the top will show how many questions you have left.
Click on the camera icon to open the camera. Take a photo of your face including both the top of your head and your chin in the picture. Approve the picture, and you will return to the home page.
